export function Popup({ isOpen, onClose, items }) { if (!isOpen) return null; // Cek apakah `items` ada dan merupakan array yang valid if (!Array.isArray(items) || items.length === 0) { return (
e.stopPropagation()}>
Event Details

No events available

); } return (
e.stopPropagation()}>
Event Details
{items.map((item) => (

{item.eventName}

Type: {item.eventType}

Date: {new Date(item.eventDate).toLocaleDateString()}

Go to Event
))}
); }
